title: ZK I Zettel 7,2,3 - Niklas Luhmann-Archiv
body:
7,2,3
					Rose, S. 5: "We shall assume a definition of avalue as an attitude held by an individual orgroup toward an object – material or nonmaterial,'real' or 'imaginary' – such that the object isesteemed, as something worthy of choice, so thatin relation to the behavior of those who hold it, thevalue has a 'should' or 'ought' quality."
